title: How to Find Your Top Follower of the Month in Twitter

steps.title: Go to https://x.com/ in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://x.com/ in a web browser. If you aren't already logged into your account, enter your phone number, email address, or username and password to do so now. You must have X Premium to unlock account analytics. This is a paid subscription service. [1] X Research source If you don't have X Premium, you won't be able to see your top follower or other analytics. You can only see your follower analytics on the X website.

steps.title: Click on the More option.
steps.content: Click on the More option. You can see it in the left menu panel. A drop-down menu will appear on your screen.

steps.title: Select Analytics.
steps.content: Select Analytics . This is in the pop-up menu. If you don't see this option, click to expand Creator Studio . Alternatively, you can directly visit https://analytics.twitter.com/ .

steps.title: Scroll down to "Top Follower".
steps.content: Scroll down to "Top Follower". You can see your top follower for the current month; in other words, this is the user with the highest follower count that followed you in the month. If you don't have a Top Follower for the month it simply says "No new followers in.... (current month)." You can also track your retweets , posts , and unfollows .
